item.title: Time for Michael Steele to Resign
item.description: When Republican Congressmen and -women are more conservative than the party chair, it’s time for a new party chair. Micheal Steele took his seat and immediately alienated conservatives, the backbone of the Republican party. By attacking Rush Limbaugh, Steele attacked one of the few people in the US with the courage to speak the truth. For five years, Democrats have prayed – PRAYED – that Al Qaeda in Iraq would defeat the US Military.
